sentence: “The Title 42 Revocation thus stands as a radical outlier — seemingly the only COVID-19-based restriction the Administration sees fit to end,” said Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich, Louisiana Attorney General Jeff Landry and Missouri Attorney General Eric S. Schmitt.
author: Stephen Dinan
title: States sue to halt Biden from ending border order stopping illegal immigrants

sentence: Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich, Louisiana Attorney General Jeff Landry, and Missouri Attorney General Eric Schmitt have filed a lawsuit against President Joe Biden’s administration for plans to end the Title 42 border control that has helped stem waves of illegal immigration since 2020.
author: John Binder
title: Arizona, Louisiana, Missouri Sue Biden for Ending Title 42 Border Control

sentence: DeSantis’ sentiments have been felt by many as Missouri Attorney General Eric Schmitt, Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich, and Louisiana Attorney General Jeff Landry filed a lawsuit against Biden following the CDC’s announcement.
author: Laura Ramirez
title: DeSantis slams Biden’s revocation of Title 42: ‘This is a dereliction of duty!’
